per_strada.name: Per Strada
per_strada.format: Reels, 30-90 seconds. Vertical, subtitled, warm color grade.
per_strada.purpose: HERO CONTENT. Gets shared, makes EVA feel real, reaches beyond followers.
production_notes: Film batches: dedicate 2 afternoons to filming 6-8 interviews each
Locations matter: shoot where light is beautiful (golden hour, under porticos, in piazzette)
Use a lav mic or just get close with the phone ‚Äî audio quality > video perfection
Subtitles are mandatory (most watch without sound)
Color grade warm: golds, creams, warm shadows
Don't approach with mic and generic questions ‚Äî approach with genuine curiosity
Let the woman think. Hold the silence. The pause IS the content
End each interview with warm 'Grazie' and a card about EVA
interview_questions: Cosa ti fa sentire bella? E non intendo esteticamente.

Se potessi insegnare una cosa a tutte le donne, quale sarebbe?
